Registration.Name: Registration
Registration.Description: Register for future use of the CE Assistant!
Registration.Content: Registration is key to accessing the functions of CE Assistant. You need to register to use any roll-related commands, check your CR, or update your color! Please use /register with the link to your personal CE page.

Rolls.Name: Rolls
Rolls.Description: Learn how to roll and about different rolls!
Rolls.Content: Rolling is a fun way to try new games! Click below to find out more about all of the solo and co-op roll events!

Rerolls.Name: Rerolls
Rerolls.Description: Learn how to reroll and about reroll tokens!
Rerolls.Content: With each roll event you complete, you'll earn a certain amount of reroll tokens. These one-time use tokens allow you to reroll any roll event you're currently participating in - but be sure that's what you want, because some events come with additional cool-down times should you fail a rerolled event!

Update.Name: Update
Update.Description: Learn how to update your profile!
Update.Content: Updating your profile is simple and quick. Type in /update and within seconds CE Assistant will grab all of your new, updated data from your CE page. P.S. be sure to use this command whenever you complete a rolled game!

Steam Game.Name: Steam Game
Steam Game.Content: /steam-game is a very simple functoin that just takes in the name of a game and returns information about it from steam and CE. Give it a try with your favorite game!

Admin Options.Name: Admin Options
Admin Options.Description: Ssh! This is the secret admin command :)
Admin Options.Content: As an admin, you have access to more commands than regular users. /add-reason will add any text you provide to it to the bottom of any message sent by CE Assistant in <#949482536726298666>. This is meant as a way to explain any changes made to games (including removal).

Color Editing.Name: Color Editing
Color Editing.Description: Learn how to change your color!
Color Editing.Content: Try /set-color to adjust the color of your name to any unlocked color you have! For example, B Rank users would have access to blue (B), green (C), brown (D), and grey (E).

Check Rolls.Name: Check Rolls
Check Rolls.Description: Learn how to check your rolls!
Check Rolls.Content: To check your progress on your current (and completed) rolls, try /check-rolls - see what comes up!
